meanings.definition: A band or sheet of connective tissue, primarily collagen, that surrounds or binds together muscles, organs, and other structures in the body.
meanings.sent1: The fasciae help hold our muscles in place.
meanings.sent2: Doctors study the fasciae to understand how our body parts are connected.
meanings.sent3: The fasciae decided to have a party and invited all the muscles.
meanings.sent4: Like a strong net, the fasciae weave around our organs for protection.
meanings.sent5: I imagined the fasciae as tiny bands holding everything together inside me.
